name: BOT BALLING FPS MULTIPLAYER GAME (LAN VERSION)
name_original: BOT BALLING FPS MULTIPLAYER GAME (LAN VERSION)
description:
This is the LAN version of the game. You can send the game to your friends or even play in the same room. View the video of the steps for the LAN connection. A very friendly and easy to understand lobby. Come and try it!!!

Maximum of 16 player per game.

***IMPORTANT DISABLE YOUR FIREWALL IN WINDOWS AND ANTIVIRUS***

If it does not work and for general feedback also, please email us to uarepixels@gmail.com

We have another online multiplayer version of the game at https://esposcar.itch.io/bot-balling-fps-multiplayer-game

CONTROLS

- W and S for moving back and front

- A and D for moving right and left

- You can even use the arrow keys to move.

- Left button of the mouse to fire the balls.

- Space button for making a short propulsion

- Esc button for going out of the game or pause. In case the cursor gets locked just press alt-tab to unlock it.

- Tab button for viewing the scoreboard and players scores in scene.
